conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-fidelity isometric cutaway render that follows the 2D architectural blueprint accurately.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent transformation. Walls have proper thickness and height. Some slight softening on the top wall edges but otherwise structurally sound.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity. All rooms (M. Bedroom, Bed-1, Bed-2, Kitchen, Living/Dining) are present in correct relative positions. Balcony placements are accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement aligns with the 2D plan, including dining set, sofas, and bed orientations. Kitchen and bathroom fixtures are correctly localized.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, distraction-free render. Lighting is soft but provides enough contrast to see interior junctions. Background is neutral and professional.

detected_errors.description: Minor window/door opening details are slightly simplified compared to the complex CAD lines in the 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally accurate 3D translation that preserves nearly all geometric and interior planning details from the original 2D floor plan.
